## dialog.setAlert() function

Sets the function to be run when Blockly.dialog.alert() is called.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function setAlert(alertFunction?: (message: string, callback?: () => void) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  alertFunction | (message: string, callback?: () =&gt; void) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_ The function to be run, or undefined to restore the default implementation. |

**Returns:**

void
